content.rendered:
We’re seeking volunteers to help make this event happen!

Volunteers are day-of-event helpers that pitch in to help manage registration, security, speaker wrangling and more.

Gain the respect of your peers by being involved with the community, and you get to learn new things too!

Keep in mind that not all volunteers will be accepted.

Volunteer Hunt Complete!
